lender.name: Zachary

lender.occupational_info: I am a college student, studying political science and Spanish.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.loan_because: I have a desire to help others who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I sell pharmaceuticals.

lender.name: Gretchen
lender.loan_because: I feel so blessed to have been born in a Country where we are given so much and want to give something back to others not so fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: My work is not a passion but it earns me a decent living. My volunteer work is what gives me a sense of worth and a life purpose. To be able to help others that are not so fortunate gives me great pleasure.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I think that the KIVA approach is a great way to change peoples living conditions

lender.name: SUSAN

lender.occupational_info: never judge, help where you can

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I believe access to capital and credit is a human right.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I am extremely, extremely lucky to have the life that I have (good job, good health, living in a developed country). Many are not a fortunate as me.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the US Department of Energy in the nonproliferation of weapons of mass destruction (chemical, biological, nuclear, and missile). I organize workshops on export control of commodities that have both a military and civilian use (dual-use commodities) for front-line enforcement officers (Customs and Border Guards), export license reviewers, and enterprises that produce those commodities. My portfolio of countries includes the countries of the Caucasus region (Armenia, Azerbaijan, and Georgia), Russia, and Ukraine. My portfolio previously included Central Asia. [By the way, the photo of me was taken in Bishkek, Kyrgyz Republic.]

lender.name: Rustysword
lender.loan_because: I am trying to start my own programming buisness and I understand that the costs are a real barrier in buisness.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to help other parents & end world poverty.

lender.name: Tom Kamau
lender.loan_because: I love to support development and positive change.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate development work in NMS China and partner with our Chinese partner organisation Amity.

lender.name: Jerikka
lender.loan_because: I know that if I was in these people's positions, I would very much appreciate others helping me. AND I just enjoy helping others. :)

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: JERRY
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Looking for little ways to help others across the world improve their lives, because it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Annelise
lender.loan_because: Jesus said, 'It is more blessed to give than to receive.'

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who are in need. When I was young, my family often needed help and people were always willing to help us.
lender.occupational_info: In my job, I often help large businesses with loans. I enjoy the opportunity to personally help those who do not enjoy all of the benefits of a large business.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: entrepreneurial spirit needs to be nurtured

lender.name: Henry Liu
lender.loan_because: every loan changes a life, gives an opportunity, and makes our world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I find ways technology and the internet impacts social entrepreneurship and changes lives.

lender.name: Stig Ove Voll
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people.

lender.name: Domenique
lender.loan_because: it's needed.
lender.occupational_info: I try to make the world a happier place.

lender.name: Chitra
lender.loan_because: Micro lending is a great idea. It takes only a small contribution on my part to help someone. It feels great to see the borrowers grow in their business and repay their loans.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: This is an interesting project that I would like to support.
lender.occupational_info: My customers are the employees of my company, I focus on the technology and systems that manage employee benefits, payroll, hiring, personal files, injuries, and training.

lender.name: Charlene
lender.loan_because: of KARMA so that the world may also help my foundation too. http://causes.com/HM2S
lender.occupational_info:
Folks who suffer OCD and many other different conditions can often "pass" in society with little or no suspicion. Not so with compulsive hair-pulling (Trichotillomania), which highjacks a person's peace of mind and their looks. Current estimates there are 1-2 out of 50 people living with Trichotillomania.
As the owner of a hair specialty salon for hair loss and hair disorders, Charlene Blacer saw first-hand the great need of this underserved population and founded Help Me 2 Stop.org, a charitable organization which provides grants for Trichotillomania sufferers to receive free or affordable cosmetic treatments to help boost their morale and get them on the road to recovery.

lender.name: Bernice Autumn
lender.loan_because: I believe that together we are healing the world, one heart at a time. We are also healing the world's finances, one open heart/one open hand at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I am a counselor. I try to help people understand their problems better and hopefully help them find some peace of mind.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: Someone lent me money when I needed, and it helped me tremendously. and now it is my turn!
lender.occupational_info: We design and analyze buildings so that they are safe for stability, gravity, and lateral forces (wind & earthquake primarly)

lender.name: Evan Fahey
lender.loan_because: I've seen how far a little money can go and I want to help.

lender.name: Isaias
lender.loan_because: I'm Christian

lender.name: toshi
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of a global network of support.

lender.name: Rebecca Allen
lender.loan_because: we are all one
lender.occupational_info: I own a retail store that focuses on Fair Trade and ethically traded goods from artisans around the world. I also design and furnish homes and businesses.

lender.name: OM Candles
lender.loan_because: entrepreneurs across the world deserve the opportunity to express their business vision. Everything around us was once an idea and nothing happens without taking action. Kiva loans give the opportunity for such action to begin. OM Shanti.

lender.name: Roseanne
lender.loan_because: It is right. We have enough as do our children & grandchildren. Others should have the same in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am fortunate enough to have owned my own Gift Shop & Wine Making Shop for 18 years. Our children are grown & my husband is retired.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: because I believe in what Kiva is doing to fight global poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work at at-risk teenagers to help empower them with the skills to successfully navigate life.

lender.name: Sarah Brooks
lender.loan_because: It feels like the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm focused on supporting the work of social entrepreneurs – people solving social problems – globally. I use design as my medium, and I'm also a mixed-media artist.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and try to love them the way God loves me.
lender.occupational_info: I help those who need it.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I think this is a brilliant idea.
lender.occupational_info: I help create special effects for films and television.

lender.name: Fabian
lender.loan_because: Being blessed with living in peace and with a high quality of life I feel the urge to share a part of what I have earned with those not so lucky. Kiva offers me to do this while having the choice of who and what project I like to support.

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: I'm a leftie commie pinko socialist liberal treehugging granola-eatin' atheistic anarchist. Or something.
lender.occupational_info: I do interesting things with other people's computers.

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: I can. I want to help someone who hasn't been as fortunate as me.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired from my work in administration and now help my children & their families and travel with my husband when I can.

lender.name: Alma
lender.loan_because: We, students from Universidad del Valle de Mexico Campus Mexicali loaned because our teacher Juan Pablo Paredes asked us as a proyect for a Negotiation class! We are law students.
lender.occupational_info: Very satisfying

lender.name: Bec McConnochie
lender.loan_because: It's a way I can share what I have with others, and what I like most about Kiva is that it isn't a one off donation, it is about enabling people to build more sustainable incomes.

lender.name: Branimir
lender.occupation: founder of Green Point Of View
lender.loan_because:
What is Green Point Of View? We are a non-profit organization with a wide range of activities.
What are our goals? By uniting with other organizations and personals we aim for improving the environment that we live in. For the development of our projects we will establish scientific and technical knowledge exchange with other organizations. We also want to remodel the social behavior so that it is not that self destructive.
How are we going to achieve our goals? Our initiative is very serious and will undoubtedly be a great challenge but with hard work and constancy we can change the world we live in. We have the most important thing - the green point of view. Everything else is achievable.
How can you help us? Everybody who takes our idea as his can help us with just an idea as well as sponsorship. We will appreciate your help. You can be sure that the nature will do too.
lender.occupational_info:
The necessity of funds to implement the specific campaigns and development of new projects remains open. Therefore, we address to you to ask you to invest your spare money in one ideal purpose.
If you are sympathetic to our cause and want to be a part of it make a donation in favor of the organization for the project "Take a breath - plant a tree”.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I would like to do my little part to bring some balance to the quality of life around the world.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.occupational_info: I work with environmental cleanup and groundwater monitoring to maintain human health.

lender.name: Mattias
lender.loan_because: it seems right
lender.occupational_info: Developing technology for the car industry, waitering at the opera house, and teaching teenage kids math :)

lender.name: Stefano
lender.loan_because: I'm happy to help those even less lucky than me.

lender.name: Melissa

lender.occupational_info: I help college students prepare themselves for the world of work.

All with the goal of improving the lives and oppurtunities of these kids.

lender.occupational_info: I develop internet-based software

I study a lot and I am only a freshman so there are many more all nighters to come. I want to be a pediatrician some day and work abroad. Who knows maybe someday I can meet someone I loan to. :)

lender.occupational_info: I work to inspire people to donate money to a homeless shelter.

lender.name: Brandon

lender.name: Emmanuel
lender.loan_because:
I loan because we all have a moral duty to help one another...
There is a passage in the bible that say's it better than I can...
We are mist, morning dew, a vapor that disapears in the first rays of light. Our life “appears for a little time and then vanishes.” ... So whoever knows the right thing to do and fails to do it, for him it is sin.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a student!
I study politics and philosophy

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to become the change I want to see.
lender.occupational_info: I am reporter whose work often documents the struggles and occasional triumphs of the little guy/gal.

lender.loan_because: It feels good and I thank God that I am able to do it.

lender.name: Pat

lender.name: Eers lumineers
lender.loan_because: A new life-changing look is easy with LUMINEERS. Avoid the shots, grinding, pain and difficulty of traditional veneers and braces. And LUMINEERS are proven to last over 20 years. http://www.lumineers.com
lender.occupational_info: A new life-changing look is easy with LUMINEERS. Avoid the shots, grinding, pain and difficulty of traditional veneers and braces. And LUMINEERS are proven to last over 20 years. http://www.lumineers.com

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: It's important to give back and support women business owners!

lender.name: Emil
lender.loan_because: I want to invest the gifts I have been given to other people.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a headmaster of a secondary school in Gothenburg, Sweden's second largest city. My job is to manage the business, to engage teachers and to create a suitable environment for education.

lender.name: Lyndie
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know I am helping other people.

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: The World needs Givers" - not just "takers"
lender.occupational_info: Do unto others as you would have them do unto you.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the stories of the entrepreneurs and the promise of their projects.
lender.occupational_info: I study how cooking and non-thermal food processing affect the energetic value of foods. This research can help us understand the significance of food processing during the last ~2 million years of human evolution and in modern society.

lender.name: Marburgers
lender.loan_because: we love to give back to other people. We have struggled as a family, but have always managed to find something to help others. This helps us remember how much God has helped us.
lender.occupational_info: Philip is a Nurse at a hospital and Jenny is a teacher. Ahren is 8, Madilynn is 5, Ailey is 3, and Shaelynn is 5 months old.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: That's what love does!
lender.occupational_info: I am a health consultant and educator. I help people become healthier by looking carefully at their diet and lifestyle. I also teach courses in nutrition and religion at a local university.

lender.name: Pax Romana
lender.loan_because:
I can. But I'm looking forward to the times described in Esajah 65:20-23.
Я бы хотел, чтобы помочь людям во всем мире с тем, что я могу, или с деньгами или даже лучшего знания из Библии. Люблю эти стихи из библии: Исаия 65:20-23

lender.name: Geert
lender.loan_because: it gives people hope, it is a help on the way to a better existance for the people on Kiva who needs a loan.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a school as employee personel and payroll .

lender.name: JEFF
lender.loan_because: As a family we donate to charity instead of exchanging Christmas gifts each year. KIVA was our first - - the gift that keeps on giving!

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I want to see others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers for staff at the University of Saskatchewan.

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: I admire women with entrepreneurial skills who overcome obstacles.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from teaching now.

lender.name: The Feminate Factor
lender.loan_because: the more people I can help have a better life, the better life I will have.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the Dream Building business. We turn talent and skills into valuable resources that improve the quality of life and make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Necia
lender.loan_because: It is everything I agree with in this life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach. I make art. I sew. I cook. I like to laugh and smile, and I feel that above all things kindness is the most important. In all work and life I strive to be kind.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: We all win by helping people around the world become self-sufficient. Pride and hope breed success and prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: I develop tools that help inventors discover new materials and drugs for uses around the globe.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I respect the people of this world who want to make a better life for themselves and their families. I have a good life but living is not easy for many, and if my loans help then I'm glad.
lender.occupational_info: In my job I look after people and the organisation to ensure it's a fair and equitable place to work.

lender.name: Alyssa
lender.loan_because: I love people.
lender.occupational_info: I just graduated from college and I'm studying to teach English as a foreign language!

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I know it can change lives.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to become self supporting and provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office handling phone calls, paperwork, and on a computer.

lender.name: Moses
lender.loan_because: i have extra money, and it would be messed up if I didn't use it to help.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a chance to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Work in an office.

lender.name: Laura & Bobby

lender.occupational_info: My husband is a fire fighter and I am a web developer.

lender.name: Gabriele

lender.occupational_info: I help people use technology to improve their work, their relationships, and their lives.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe in social business as a way of changing the world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I work to encourage the use of renewable energy in the community where I live.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I want to be a blessing to people, many of whom work hard, and are doing all within their power to make better lives for themselves and others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach inmates in a prison. Though many have made poor choices in their life, I try to offer them the hope and advantages of education.

lender.name: SpecialEquestriansStaff
lender.loan_because: We are a group of caring and giving individuals who enjoy helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Therapeutic Equestrian Center who provides services for children and adults with disabilities.

lender.name: ASIJ Middle School
lender.loan_because: Kiva offers a great way to teach kids about community and economic development, as well as geography as we connect our school with people living all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are the Middle School of American School in Japan, a N-12 school located in the western suburbs of Tokyo. Our school mission is to "develop compassionate, inquistive learners prepared for global responsibility."

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.name: Jennipher
lender.loan_because: I love to see women succeed as entrepreneurs. I loan because I can.
